Workflow.Name: Training Session Start Date and End Time validation
Workflow.Description: This business rule will validate if End time is not earlier than the start time and if also the start time is not later than the end date and time.

LocalizedName.description: Training Session Start Date and End Time validation

Description.description: This business rule will validate if End time is not earlier than the start time and if also the start time is not later than the end date and time.

label.description: must not be earlier or equal to the Start Date and time.
